message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for this product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't let go of this product for less than $10,500. It's a very fair price considering its value.
I understand the value, Alice, but I have a budget in mind.  Could we meet in the middle at $9,750?
